name: FormGlut – User friendly, Drag & Drop form builder
author: AppGlut

sections.description:
Revolutionize Form Creation with FormGlut Forms

Transform the way you build forms with FormGlut Forms, the unparalleled WordPress Contact Form Plugin meticulously crafted by Appglut. Whether you’re a seasoned developer or a newcomer, FormGlut Forms empowers you to effortlessly craft visually stunning and highly functional forms for your website within minutes.

== Explore Extraordinary Features ==

  • Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder: Experience form creation like never before with an intuitive drag-and-drop builder that turns complexity into simplicity.
  • Multi-column Contact Form Layout: Bid farewell to lengthy, intimidating forms by elegantly organizing fields into multi-column layouts, enhancing user interaction.
  • Smart Conditional Logic Form Fields: Create dynamic forms that adapt to user input, displaying only relevant fields and streamlining the form-filling process.
  • Reusability with Templates: Access a library of reusable templates for various forms, including customizable contact forms tailored to your unique needs.
  • Top-notch Security: Safeguard your forms from spam with reCAPTCHA (v2 & v3), hCaptcha, or even captcha-free turnstile integration.
  • Responsive and Mobile-friendly: Ensure a seamless experience on any device with 100% responsive and mobile-friendly forms.
  • Placeholder Customization: Tailor your contact forms with personalized placeholder text, enhancing form clarity and user interaction.
  • AJAX Submission and Validation: Experience smooth form submissions with client-side and server-side data validation, reducing errors and enhancing efficiency.
  • Beautiful Email Notifications: Delight your users and admins with visually appealing email notifications upon form submission.
  • Flexible Thank You Page: Configure a customized thank-you page, displaying success messages or redirecting users to a designated URL.
  • Role-based Form Restrictions: Restrict form access based on user roles, providing a personalized experience.
  • Time-limited Form Display: Display forms only within specified time/date ranges for targeted campaigns or events.
  • Extensive Form Field Options: Choose from 50+ form field types, ensuring versatility and customization for any web form.
  • In-depth Analytics: Gain insights into form performance with analytics tracking displays and lead capture metrics.
  • Default Values and URL Parameters: Set default values for form fields or populate them dynamically from URL parameters.
  • Easy Export/Import: Seamlessly export/import forms for efficient setup or migration.
  • Data Export Options: Export form data in CSV, Excel, ODS, or JSON formats for advanced analysis.
  • Advanced Filtering: Filter data by status, providing detailed and organized insights.
  • One-click Migration: Effortlessly migrate from other form builder plugins with our one-click migrator.

== FormGlut Forms: Unmatched Speed and Functionality ==

FormGlut Forms is designed for speed, loading minimal assets (less than 30KB CSS and JS combined) while delivering top-notch functionality. Experience superior performance compared to other form builder plugins that load significantly larger assets.

== Best Contact Form Plugin in WordPress ==

FormGlut Forms stands out as the best contact form plugin, offering a rich feature set, an intuitive user interface, and exceptional drag-and-drop functionality. Enjoy premium components, including conditional logic, 50+ custom fields, 3rd-party integrations, and a built-in entry management system, all completely free and open source.

== Unleash the Power of Drag & Drop ==

Create any form imaginable within minutes using our powerful drag & drop form builder. Effortlessly migrate from other form builders, including Gravity Forms, WPForms, Caldera and Ninja Forms.

== Revolutionize Form Layouts with Multi-column Design ==

Escape the monotony of long, daunting forms by embracing our unique Multi-column form layout. Streamline user interaction, making your forms visually appealing, intuitive, and easy to fill out.

== Responsive and Inclusive Design ==

FormGlut Forms prioritizes accessibility, ensuring a user-friendly experience for all, including individuals with disabilities. Your forms will look great on any device, providing a seamless experience from desktops to handheld devices.

== Advanced Features for Calculations ==

Empower your forms with advanced calculations. From loan calculators to fitness trackers, FormGlut Forms’ numeric fields and features allow you to create dynamic and engaging calculators without any coding skills.

== Real-time Email Notifications ==

Stay informed with real-time email notifications for every form submission. Keep your team in the loop and automate confirmation emails for new subscribers. Set conditions to filter submissions for a seamless email notification process.

== Unleash Your Creative Side with Customization ==

Customize your forms with HTML blocks, tooltips, orientations, custom CSS, and more. FormGlut Forms offers unparalleled flexibility to align with your branding and user experience goals.

== Effortless Subscription Management ==

Manage high volumes of subscribers effortlessly with FormGlut Forms. Organize and export entries with a single click, and integrate seamlessly with Slack, Mailchimp, and 50+ other platforms.

== Form Fields Galore ==

Choose from a wide array of form fields, including Name Fields, Email Addresses, Dropdowns, Radio Buttons, Check Boxes, Google reCAPTCHA, hCaptcha, and more.

== External Services are Using ==
FormGlut gives the captcha protection feature with Google reCAPTCHA, hCaptcha and Turnstile for enabling captcha. Here Ipinfo and google map for forms submission info details. Soon we shall introduce mailchimp subscription integration.

Google reCAPTCHA: https://www.google.com/recaptcha
hCaptcha: https://www.hcaptcha.com/
Turnstile: https://www.cloudflare.com/products/turnstile
Mailchimp: https://mailchimp.com
IpInfo: https://ipinfo.io
Google Map: https://maps.googleapis.com/maps

You can check the services terms of use and privacy policies from the above links

FormGlut Forms isn’t just a form builder; it’s a powerful tool to elevate your website’s interaction and engagement. Try it today and experience the difference!
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and activate.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/formglut directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the FormGlut -> Settings screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Do I need coding skill to use FormGlut?

No, You don’t need any programming knowledge to build any forms. It is very user friendly and simple.

Will FormGlut slow down my website?

Absolutely not. FormGlut is faster than any form builder plugin.

Can I use conditional logics when building a form?

Yes, With our advanced conditional logic panel you can build any type of complex forms.
